meanings.definition: To replace or repair the sod on (a lawn or grassy area)
meanings.sent1: I will be resodding my lawn this weekend to make it look nice again.
meanings.sent2: The landscaper is resodding the front yard to fix the bare patches.
meanings.sent3: After the dog dug up the yard, resodding became a necessity.
meanings.sent4: The resodding of the soccer field transformed it into a lush green carpet.
meanings.sent5: With careful resodding, the once patchy lawn became a vibrant green oasis.

meanings.definition: The act of replacing or repairing the sod on (a lawn or grassy area)
meanings.sent1: The resodding of the park was completed just in time for the community event.
meanings.sent2: Resodding can greatly improve the appearance and health of the grass.
meanings.sent3: The resodding project turned into a fun community activity for all to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: The resodding after the heavy rain made the field look fresh and new.
meanings.sent5: The resodding process requires careful planning and attention to detail.
